comment.author: 35155107@N08
comment.authorname: Roma ieri, Roma oggi di Alvaro de Alvariis

comment.author: 90091158@N00
comment._content: Beautiful, Coral Gables still holds so much charm and wonderful mansions. I had read about it in my childhood from my cult leader who grew up there, and I was happy to visit and the fair child gardens blew me away....Such a wonderful place in America.
